channel.title: First source release - Torax
channel.description:
[center][SIZE=3]Hey guys, since I've been working here and there a bit, I might aswell release this for now. Torax is based of Project Organic. [/SIZE] [SIZE=3]Torax:[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]Features:[/SIZE] [CODE]Dragon claws working fully Clipping Good Combat Now ALL skills working (not every feature of skilling is working yet) Teleports now working as they're supposed to... Some general stuff most RSPS's have nowadays [/CODE]
[SIZE=2]Things I've done:[/SIZE] [CODE]Worked a bit on the PVP: * Fixed dying * Specials * Some of the calculations * Added herb farming (cba to add all the features of it atm) * Some client-sided things, like making custom added objects click-able * Worked a bit on Godwars[/CODE]
[SIZE=2]Things that need to be done:[/SIZE] [CODE]* Fix Jad minigame (NPC's respawn and that's not supposed to happen, if anyone knows a fix I'll fix it myself) * Fix godwars handling (basically the same problem as jad..) * Making farming more functional * Add donator features * A proper home (which I believe about 99% of the people here can do) * Banking: if you withdraw an item and you click on an item that comes after it, you'll get the wrong item (check for yourself for info) * Anything you guys need to have fixed[/CODE]
Media: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2e677le.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2yjps9t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/3097i4y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ibxste.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/3023zmd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1ou2qh.png[/img] Sorry, I'm Dutch, but you can see it doesn't contain any virusses...
Link to full package:
REMINDER: EXTRACT THE TORAX FOLDER TO YOUR C:/ OR CHANGE findcachedir() IN signlink.java [URL=http://"http://uppit.com/k16vvhar5fc6/Torax.zip"]Torax.zip[/URL]
Credits:
Project Organic: 70% Me: 20% Tutorials/Snippets: 10%[/center]

item.title: First source release - Torax
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

looks really good, but if you look at the things to be done, most of them are required for a server and are a bitch to fix because most people on this forum aren’t real programmers. I’d download the V2.

Read full topic

item.title: First source release - Torax
item.dc:creator: @mrnessie mrnessie
item.description:
@mrnessie wrote:

I always liked the project organic source, but may i ask, What have you changed/edited. I know for a fact that the shop patch is easy, just add a anti-cheat engine System, but what did you add besides farming and the object fixes?

Read full topic

item.title: First source release - Torax
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“JavaLearner, post:13, topic:519197”]I think you have the same farming as every other PI has, but I’m not sure.[/quote]anybody can add joshs tutorial on r-s and fix it up :rolleyes:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:14, topic:519197”][quote author=JavaLearner link=topic=637655.msg4298634#msg4298634 date=1368630542]
I think you have the same farming as every other PI has, but I’m not sure.
[/quote]
Nah most PI’s have some crappy farming with no anims or actual farm. It’s click seed on patch and xp. Mine’s near perfect for a solo patch.[/quote]get dem configs

Read full topic

item.title: First source release - Torax
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:519197”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=637655.msg4298236#msg4298236 date=1368569994]
I’m worried some of this was ripped from my server…
[/quote]It wasn’t I already did a comparison to the original organic and a lot of it doesn’t look different besides some general fix ups and a couple of class remakes.[/quote]
No, JavaLearner and I were working on a project, not organic.

JavaLearner:

I’ve ripped nothing… What is there to rip from your server that I could use?

I never said anything was I said I was worried that something was.
We did have a good(ish) farming…

Read full topic

item.title: First source release - Torax
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

[center][SIZE=3]Hey guys, since I’ve been working here and there a bit, I might aswell release this for now.
Torax is based of Project Organic.
[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Torax:[/SIZE]

[SIZE=2]Features:[/SIZE]

Dragon claws working fully Clipping Good Combat Now ALL skills working (not every feature of skilling is working yet) Teleports now working as they're supposed to... Some general stuff most RSPS's have nowadays

[SIZE=2]Things I’ve done:[/SIZE]

[CODE]Worked a bit on the PVP:

  • Fixed dying
  • Specials
  • Some of the calculations
  • Added herb farming (cba to add all the features of it atm)
  • Some client-sided things, like making custom added objects click-able
  • Worked a bit on Godwars[/CODE]

[SIZE=2]Things that need to be done:[/SIZE]

[CODE]* Fix Jad minigame (NPC’s respawn and that’s not supposed to happen, if anyone knows a fix I’ll fix it myself)

  • Fix godwars handling (basically the same problem as jad…)
  • Making farming more functional
  • Add donator features
  • A proper home (which I believe about 99% of the people here can do)
  • Banking: if you withdraw an item and you click on an item that comes after it, you’ll get the wrong item (check for yourself for info)
  • Anything you guys need to have fixed[/CODE]

Media:

2e677le.png778×534

2yjps9t.png775×534

3097i4y.png775×532

ibxste.png774×532


1ou2qh.png777×593

Sorry, I’m Dutch, but you can see it doesn’t contain any virusses…

Link to full package:

REMINDER: EXTRACT THE TORAX FOLDER TO YOUR C:/ OR CHANGE findcachedir() IN signlink.java
Torax.zip

Credits:

Project Organic: 70%
Me: 20%
Tutorials/Snippets: 10%[/center]

Read full topic
